name: Adelie - Water Under the Bridge
description:
Harvest fish daily to keep the baby penguins fed. Be careful, the fish won't go without a fight!
Carefully plan your route in this turn-based dungeon crawler to out-maneuver the fish- how long can you survive?

No background music because of the deadline and also because I still don't know how to make background music. 😔

Controls

Z + X - Skip Cutscenes
Arrows - Move/Attack
Enter - Pause Menu

by Kris De Asis

Made in 48 hours
for Ludum Dare 52
